questions.question_text: jyāre sarva karma ane māyā teno nāsh karanārā ne māyāthī par je sākṣhātkār Shrī Puruṣhottam Bhagwān athavā te Bhagwānnā maḷel sant temanī ________ jyāre thāy chhe tyāre temanā āshraythī māyā ullanghāy chhe.
questions.explanation: temanī jīvne prāpti jyāre thāy chhe tyāre temanā āshraythī māyā ullanghāy chhe.

questions.question_text: Bhagwān ne Bhagwānnā sant e ja ________ chhe.
questions.explanation: Bhagwān ne Bhagwānnā sant e ja kalyāṇkārī chhe.

questions.question_text: Jene Bhagwānno ne santno ________ sahit nishchay hoy...
questions.explanation: Jene Bhagwānno ne santno māhātmya-gnāne sahit nishchay hoy...

questions.question_text: Bhagwānnā santnī sevā to bahu ________ maḷe.
questions.explanation: Bhagwānnā santnī sevā to bahu moṭā puṇyavāḷāne maḷe.

questions.question_text: ...satpuruṣhno āsharo kare tyāre game tevo ________ hoy to paṇ ati pavitra thaī jāy chhe...
questions.explanation: ...satpuruṣhno āsharo kare tyāre game tevo pāpī hoy to paṇ ati pavitra thaī jāy chhe...

questions.question_text: Bhagwān ane Moṭā Sādhune āshare karīne to ________ jevā dukh āvavānā hoy te paṇ ṭaḷī jāy ne sādhan karīne to kūṭī kūṭīne marī jāy to paṇ na ṭaḷe.
questions.explanation: Bhagwān ane Moṭā Sādhune āshare karīne to vādaḷ jevā dukh āvavānā hoy te paṇ ṭaḷī jāy ne sādhan karīne to kūṭī kūṭīne marī jāy to paṇ na ṭaḷe.
